task: A store sells notebooks for $3 each and pens for $2 each. If Sarah buys 5 notebooks and some pens, spending $25 total, how many pens did she buy?
John has 15 apples. He gives 1/3 of them to his friend. How many apples does John have left?
A rectangle has a length of 12 cm and a width of 5 cm. What is its area?
If x + 7 = 15, what is the value of 2x?
A car travels 60 km in 45 minutes. What is its average speed in km/h?
Maria has $120. She spends 40% on clothes and 25% on food. How much money does she have left?
The sum of three consecutive integers is 48. What is the smallest of these integers?
A triangle has angles measuring 45° and 60°. What is the measure of the third angle?
If 5 workers can complete a job in 8 days, how many days will it take 10 workers to complete the same job?
A cylinder has a radius of 3 cm and height of 10 cm. What is its volume? (Use π ≈ 3.14)
The price of a shirt is $45 after a 25% discount. What was the original price?
If f(x) = 2x + 3 and f(a) = 11, what is the value of a?
A box contains 8 red balls and 12 blue balls. What is the probability of randomly selecting a red ball?
Solve for x: 3(x - 4) = 2x + 5
A train 200 meters long passes a pole in 10 seconds. What is its speed in m/s?
What is the slope of the line passing through points (2, 3) and (6, 11)?
A bag contains 5 red, 3 green, and 2 yellow marbles. If you draw 2 marbles without replacement, what is the probability both are red?
The perimeter of a square is 48 cm. What is the length of its diagonal? (Round to nearest integer)
If log₂(x) = 5, what is the value of x?
A rectangular garden is 3 times as long as it is wide. If the perimeter is 96 meters, what is the length?
Evaluate: ∫(from 0 to 2) x² dx
A population grows from 1000 to 1500 in 3 years. What is the annual growth rate? (Round to nearest percent)
Solve the system: 2x + y = 10 and x - y = 2. What is x?
A cone has a base radius of 5 cm and height of 12 cm. What is its volume? (Use π ≈ 3.14)
If sin(θ) = 0.6 and θ is acute, what is cos(θ)?
A sequence is defined by aₙ = 3n - 2. What is the sum of the first 10 terms?
The ratio of boys to girls in a class is 3:5. If there are 24 students total, how many girls are there?
A cube has a surface area of 96 cm². What is its volume?
If matrix A = [[2, 1], [0, 3]] and B = [[1, 0], [2, 1]], what is the element at position (1,2) in A×B?
A radioactive substance decays to 25% of its original amount in 20 days. What is its half-life in days?
